title: What do you think about Nigerian singer Lyta getting accused of heavily plagiarizing GOT7’s “Just Right” music video? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now, for those of you who don´t know about this: it was recently revealed that a Nigerian singer called Lyta made a song called ´Hold me down´. When the MV was released, fans realized that the music video had very similar visuals to Got7´s MV ´Just Right´from 2015. KBuzz on Youtube made a video about it:  Here´s Lyta´s Hold me down:  And here´s Got7´s Just Right:  In the article someone said that Lyta wasn´t the video producer which could probably be true, but I don´t have enough information on that so I won´t say anything. Personally, I think the intro to the video is too similar to the intro in Just Right, but the rest of the video doesn´t seem like it was copy and pasted from it. I still think that maybe they should apologize, since the it´s obvious that someone copied it but no hate to either artist. I hope this was helpful, bye. -A
